!Duelist Kaien: In *Giran* you must seek the *Breka Orc Overlords* and *fettered souls*. The Breka Orc tribe wields considerable power in northern Giran, and they are led by the Breka Orc Overlords. Fettered Souls are undead that appear in the 'Corridor of Death,' the path connecting Giran and Oren. You must bring back 10 Breka Orc Overlord necklaces and 10 fettered soul fangs as proof. [Quest _222_TestOfDuelist 30623-11.htm|Listen further to the explanation]
